&reftitle.description;
booloutput_add_rewrite_var stringname stringvalue
This functions starts a 'URL-Rewriter' output buffer handler if it has not been started yet, and passes the name and value parameters to it. Consequent calls to output_add_rewrite_var will pass the parameters to the existing 'URL-Rewriter'.
When the output buffer is flushed (by calling ob_flush, ob_end_flush, ob_get_flush or at the end of the script) the 'URL-Rewriter' adds the name/value pairs as query parameters to URLs in attributes of HTML tags and adds hidden fields to forms based on the values of the url_rewriter.tags and url_rewriter.hosts configuration directives.
Each name/value pair added to the 'URL-Rewriter' is added to the URLs and/or forms even if this results in duplicate URL query parameters or elements with the same name attributes.

&reftitle.parameters;
name
The variable name.
value
The variable value.
